website_summaries.verdict: A highly-rated product focused specifically on creating fuller hair with a vegan vitamin capsule.
pros: Uses 11 different vitamins to help develop hair growth
Sugar-free formula does not contain any animal ingredients or collagen
Also helps grow thicker eyebrows and eyelashes
cons: A few users claimed that the product made them break out

customer_reviews.title: ... give this product a try due to they got excellent consumer reviewes
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to give this product a try due to they got excellent consumer reviewes; but now I'm starting to think the reviews are biased due to the fact that My hair has been fallen out like crazy ever since I started using this product. I'm not sure if this is part of the side effect but regardless lossing hair is not fun so I stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product For African American Hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever used. I have relaxed hair that recently begin to break off and this product has helped in grow a little over and inch in less that a month!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: BREAKOUTS + HEADACHES
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT BUY!! It has been two whole days since i have started using this. I would very much not reccommend buying this product. Since using it, my body has broken out with bumps/pimples all over and ive gotten the worst headaches. There has been no other alter to my diet besides these pills and my body is literally repulsed by them. And they are very very strong headaches thatll keep you awake at night and last hours!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I didn't like is they send you a coupon for a free ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works!!! I've been using hairfinity for years and this doesn't even compare! Within one week use of these pills after I washed my hair I noticed no shedding! These pills are a must buy! Only thing I didn't like is they send you a coupon for a free bottle of pills but when you put in your invoice number it says the number can not be found!! Very upset about this as I love these pills and would love to get my free bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine hair but lots of it and skin on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Started 2 weeks ago and already noticing an improvement in my skin and hair and nails. Nails are a lot stronger and growing really well, hair seems to have more volume than before, I have very fine hair but lots of it and skin on my face looks very nourished. I will keep buying this product and the free one makes it even better. Definitely worth a try. Price is worth the results.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair fall more than usual
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair fall more than usual everytime I use the shower. Prior to using this product I would normally have 3-4 strands of hair fall, now it's 30 strands of falling hair per shower. I had to stop taking it after a month because I noticed my scalp was already showing signs of baldness and it scared the crap out of me.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Foe Valencia

customer_reviews.title: No 4 Me
customer_reviews.text: I know we are all different and for some people this did help but for me it did nothing. And I’m not just talking about “new” hair growth but the shedding continued- so it’s a no for me
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Didn't see any results
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to be so skeptical, but I really saw no results when I have see results with other products. Also, most vitamins that have the same levels of B vitamins turn my pee color, but this does not- which makes me a bit skeptical. I do think that the high potency Country Life Biotin supplements are legit, as I started taking those and my nails improved greatly within 2 weeks and my hair at the roots feel like it is growing in thicker. I just take that with a standard B-complex and I take some additional supplements to supplement my diet as needed. As much as I wanted to believe the hype- I won't be pruchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Has helped my thinning hair due to weight loss!
customer_reviews.text: My hair became pretty thin when I lost 40 pounds, this product helped it stop falling out. It has begun growing baby hairs in just a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: elissa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Freaking amazing how it works!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to wait a couple months but this stuff is amazing. I changed the color but you can see amazing growth in less than a month. October 9th to November 5th
customer_reviews.author: Audio Vidya

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this because I am experiencing alarming hair loss. ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because I am experiencing alarming hair loss. Have been taking the supplements for almost one month and have not noticed any appreciable difference in my hair but have noticed a difference in my nails. My nails used to continually chip and crack so had to keep them short but they are now longer with few chips and cracks. Have just purchased my second bottle so am keeping my fingers crossed for increase in hair production.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: First month
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking these vitamins for a month, but I've already seen results. I can see new hair growth and some baby hairs. I have fine hair so I was looking for something that could help with that and growth. I just ordered my free bottle so I will be continuing with these vitamins. I didn't have any negative side effects. When you order these from Amazon, you will get a coupon for a free product through the naturenetics website and I've chosen to stick with the same vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Andrejczak

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my excessive shedding!
customer_reviews.text: I'm was surprised I still had hair on my head. I know it's normal to shed but this was excessive! I was taking Biotin vitamins but they didn't seem to do anything. After reading some reviews, I figured why not give HairAnew a try. Glad I did! Of course, I still shed but I'm back to what is considered "normal". I'm super happy with the product, haven't experienced any side effects, and I'm looking forward to seeing how my hair looks in the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Mar77

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these did not really do much for me. I've been taking them consistently for a month and a half. I saw about a half an inch of growth, which is normal for me during that time. It looks like it worked really well for other people, so I think it just depends on the person. Their customer service is FANTASTIC. I was torn between two other products, and when the first one didn't really work for me, she sent me the other product to try. They are very fast with communicating and offer 100% money back guarantee. It doesn't hurt to try them out!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy W.

customer_reviews.title: Love these vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands of hair vitamins over the years, and have settled on Hair Anew as part of my daily regimen. Hair Anew is a great set of vitamins, and I have noticed quite significant hair growth over time compared to others I've tried. This is not a quick fix product, but with regular use I have noticed much more growth that other brands. Plus compared to other hair growth vitamins, the cost is more economical. Hair Anew was recommended to me by someone I trust, and I offer my review with full confidence to you!
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Gasparrini

customer_reviews.title: Auto-Delivery- Huge fan of this product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for 4 months and I definitely see new hair growth on those bald shiny spots where I was told no hair would grow, especially in the receding hairline area. I’m still losing hair, per the drain in my shower, but new hair is growing due to this product and the thinning has slowed a little. It’s also great for your nails, and has changed the skin texture on my face to much more even skin tone. Between this product and Peter Thomas Roth my face is smooth as glass with no pours. I’m on auto-delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Townley

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I will say, I do not typically believe in products that say they can grow hair. I’ve struggled with growing my hair out for 10 years. After hearing about these from a friend and reading all the reviews, I decided to give them a try. I have been taking these vitamins for 3 months now (I’m on my 3rd bottle) and I have had several people tell my how long my hair is looking. I have noticed a significant hair growth (about an inch!) and I have had no other negative side effects. I will continue to take these and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Made my stomach hurt
customer_reviews.text: My stomach hurt every time I took this. At first I wasn't sure it was these vitamins, so I quit taking them and felt better in the following days. I tried to take them two more times, each time waiting until I felt better before reattempting. Every time, I had stomach pain. Maybe they contain too much Vitamin C or something that's irritating. I've never had trouble with other hair supplements in the past, so I'll go back to one of those. Unfortunately I missed the return window while giving them second and third chances, so I'll have to toss them.
customer_reviews.author: HBLL

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for two months faithfully. Noticed absolutely no difference with my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me. I’m my hair seems the same-no strength, no noticeable change in length and still experiencing fall out. :/
customer_reviews.author: shereen

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins gave me terrible headaches
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but I didn't want anyone else to experience what I did with these vitamins. They gave me miserable headaches not too long after I first started taking them. At first, I was worried I had a more serious problem because the headaches didn't stop for over a week straight. As an experiment, I stopped taking them, and the headaches went away. Then I started it up again and the headaches returned. That's enough proof for me! I'm very frustrated that I spent my money on these because I'm literally going to have to toss them. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: This hurt my stomach so bad!!!! I took it with food, drank tons of water, did everything it said and it made me so nauseous it was unbelievable! I took the whole bottle, suffered for a month and didn’t see any result what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Boca

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and no results
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third bottle because I believe in giving things a chance before you make a judgment... I had high hopes because of the amazing reviews so I prepared myself and had patience. I am a very healthy individual, I eat well, drink a gallon of water a day, and exercise daily. My hair still grows about an inch a month So I thought I would try these. No change at all... Like at all. It did make my hair any thicker, longer, Shinier or anything! So it’s a no for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Morake

customer_reviews.title: right now i am disappointed, my hair is still breaking off and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Well i am on my first bottle almost done, right now i am disappointed, my hair is still breaking off and the pills have not help, i will not be ordering again unless i see a change...i wanted to give the pills a chance but as of now nothing yet, Well i am on the second bottle and nothing hair is breaking my urine smell and atleast my hair would get think now mind you i have ling hair its breaking.😳and the pills are not working. I order the 2th bottle to give it that chance but nothing i will finish it and not order again i was praying it would work
customer_reviews.author: phone

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS MAGIC!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is MAGICAL. I'm not kidding you, I shed UNCONTROLLABLY. My hair also neverrrrr grows. This stuff took time to work, but once it starts working I saw a major change in my hair. My hair was so damaged and super thin. It also shed a lot, but now it's thick and back to being healthy. I was even able to sit in bleach for 5 hours straight without damaging a single hair on my head. You won't see results right away, but after 4 weeks you will start to get compliments and you realize this stuff actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Manifa S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I noticed nothing or no difference and used it everyday and the whole bottle
customer_reviews.author: A Man

customer_reviews.title: Bought reviews
customer_reviews.text: Here’s how they get all their reviews. I’m disappointed and I wasn’t expecting this. They buy all their reviews. I’m pessimistic if this product would actually work and it’s way too expensive. Don’t recommend... :(
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: My Nails Grew
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product to help with my hair thickness and strength. This didn't have any effect on my hair and I've used it for 2 months but it clearly helped my nails grow. They are not stronger, just longer but since I'm not really needing longer nails I'll continue to look elsewhere for my hair. People seem to have great results from this product so give it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Gillion

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you take 90 days
customer_reviews.text: I knew it would take 3-4 months to see a difference. Sure enough, I’m on my 4 th bottle and I have a head full of baby hair all around my crown. My hair isn’t near as flat at the roots as it was before this supplement. I will definitely continue taking it. My hair dresser even got the name of it from me.
customer_reviews.author: Keel

customer_reviews.title: Tasty isn't great but it works for my wife
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my wife since 2018 and she is very happy with the product. Not only her hair is falling out significantly less, her eye lashes also grew! I have not seen such noticeable change in relatively short time. Now, we are also buying this products for my in-law! I believe the taste, however, could be improved. I think Naturenetics wanted to keep the "natural" flavors of the ingredients but to be honest, the bottle smells bad. Really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth its value!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only hair supplement I have ever taken for one month and actually seen results! I’ve tried so many and none effectively helped me to grow in where my hair was thinning. Within the month I had so many baby hair growing in like crazy around my hair line and my hair on my head was visibly looking healthier. I’d like to try for another month and see how it goes!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I think it really works!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I say 'think' is because I started taking collagen at the same time so I'm not sure if it's one or the other or the combination that is working. I was having an issue with a LOT more hair falling out when brushing than usual & it really freaked me out. After taking the supplements for about 1.5 months, I feel like everything is back to normal. My nails are usually super thin and fragile but they seem to have gotten a bit stronger so I can actually grow them out a bit now. Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter42

customer_reviews.title: Definitely noticed a difference after using these two months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve waited 2 months before reviewing these vitamins. Do not expect to see a change within only a couple weeks, consistency is key. My hair is so much thicker and very vibrant and definitely growing much better than before these. Just ordered 2 more months worth. My nails are also much stronger after taking these. I am not being compensated for this review, and I will write an honest review always, good or bad!! Only advice is to give it at least 2 months before seeing the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Only tried for 1 month but difference can be told. hair is now growing on my bald spot
customer_reviews.text: I'm hitting 30 and I developed a hereditary bald spot like I'm the pope, and even though I accepted it I don't want to fully live with it. At this time it is still seen as my head is white so my black hair thinness can be seen but now I have long hair covering 60% fuller than before instead of having almost nothing and getting worse. At least now older people can't laugh with me quick when they see my bald spot as they have one too as it is now more camouflaged, low key and not as obvious as it was. it has been 1 month, so more to come! I would 100% recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: pira76

customer_reviews.title: Decent hair pills
customer_reviews.text: I got these after doing a BC on my natural 4C hair. Surprisingly, they grew the back of my hair from TWA length to neck length in 2 weeks. Unfortunately, I got sick (not from these pills) and had to stop taking them for a while. Also, even though the back of my hair grew, the rest of my hair stayed the same length - weird. But, that's why I gave it 4 stars. Other than that, it seems like a good product. I just stopped taking them because I found another item that works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I thought I would give it a try and I am so glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I have used everything from beauty supply stores, I've tried essential oils and even tried eating strictly whole foods and nothing has produced new hair growth in my thinning spots. After reading the product reviews for hair anew while I was actually looking at a completely different product, I thought I would give it a try and I am so glad that I did. With the combination of this product and eating clean, I am seeing new growth in my thinning spots for the first tie in 3 years. I am so excited! Bonus, they give you a free bottle of the same product when you make your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Celestial_b

customer_reviews.title: After 9 months, see no changes
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful. Male 66 year old and only slightly less hair on the forehead. All the 9 months trial, I only missed 1 dose which I was very proud of. But I do NOT see any difference at all. I took the picture every few weeks to compare, trying to be at the same angle and same spot. Oh well I can only wish good luck for the others. To me "waste of money" for sure.
customer_reviews.author: tanasit

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: I took almost the full bottle but did not like the smell of my urine. I started to notice about the second week of taking it. When I went to the restroom the odor lingered around. Maybe this stuff was coming through my pore or something but I could only smell it after I would pee. So, once I stop taking it the smell went away. I had this product set up on a monthly bases, but stopped so I have a box unopened sitting on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No more hair in the shower drain!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For several years, my middle-aged wife had been leaving quite a bit of hair in the shower drain, sometimes enough to keep water from going down the drain! After two months of this vitamin, her hair has stopped falling out. For the last two weeks there has been ZERO hair in the drain. You can imagine how happy my wife is. UPDATE: using it for seven months now, and only occasionally has there been any hair in the drain, and then just a tiny bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair growth!
customer_reviews.text: i picked these vitamins after reading reviews on amazon. I’ve been taking them on and off for about a year and what i noticed is that my hair grew a lot faster while taking them for about 3 months straight. I have shedding hair problem for years, especially fall and spring seasons, and nothing helps to reduce it. I wouldn’t call it hair loss cause new hair grow but with these vitamins I at least may have longer hair way faster.
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would try something different from what I normally use, again, it didn't go well, again. I have just not found a hair and skin vitamin as good as the Elon Matrix 5,000. I tried this and it was like I wasn't taking anything at all, I can tell the difference. I'm sorry but this product just did not work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: DragonQueen65

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to help post chemo hair regrowth
customer_reviews.text: Starting with three stars as I am only on Day 3. I didn’t see anyone else using this to regrow hair after chemo, so I figured I would write a review. Haven’t had any side effects. My hair is about an inch long currently. Will update in a month. Hoping it helps my super thin eyebrows. I used to have thick eyebrows and they are extremely sparse now from chemo.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely makes nails grow faster
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's only been a couple of weeks and my nails are growing so much faster that it is startling! Cons: I haven't noticed a difference with hair, though it is month 3 of using this product. I am not always good about having enough protein, though, so there could be something like that going on. Some people can get acne from biotin supplements. That is good to be aware of, so that if you experience it after starting this then you know to discontinue, or to lower your dose. I haven't had that issue, and put this on subscription. . I hope that this review is helpful to you. Do let me know, and happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Purgandi Dracointerfectorem

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamin for hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing these hair vitamins for the past year and half. Best vitamin for hair and nails! I definitely see a difference with the length of my nails within one week of use. My nails don't chip anymore. My baby hairs around my temples are more visible when I take these vitamins daily.
customer_reviews.author: Con T.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this vitamin since October 2017, I have a subscribe and save order because I do not want to miss a day! My nails are stronger than they have ever been, and my hair seems to have grown. I have very thin hair and I believe this product has helped strengthen it even through all my chemical and heat styling damages. I recommend trying it, I have tried many other hair vitamins and this seems to really help. It also has plenty of vitamin C !!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Postpartum hair loss drastically slowed!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having some intense postpartum hair loss. I mean handfuls of hair falling out. I’ve been using this about a week now, in combination with the same prenatal vitamin I’ve been taking forever. My hair has drastically slowed on falling out and the stuff that has fallen out is already showing new growth lol... I look hilarious, but this stuff is working. They smell like vitamins and are in the clear capsules. I take all my vitamins at once with a gulp of water though and these do great. Eat something first besides coffee though... you’ll get a little queasy if not. These have a lotttt if biotin, so I think they are the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: ashlyn york

customer_reviews.title: Works well for over processed hair and even makes it a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.text: Took this product to get my hair healthy again from just years of environmental damage 3 kids and some coloring here and there ( only color might hair like once a year) it worked perfectly, my hair dresser saw a big change in the health of my hair. But Asher some time like maybe 4 months off talking it, it seemed to not really grow much anymore so I took about a month break and im going back on them to see if iI be see another change in the health of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: So far no noticeable results, but keeping an open mind.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third bottle of this, but have not seen any noticeable results. I didn't take the first two in the most consistent manner, though, so I am keeping an open mind. I really appreciate the free second bottle of product, which is why I was willing to give it another chance. Hopefully after this bottle and the new one are gone I will have results or else I will have to call it quits. The customer service has been very good, though.
customer_reviews.author: TheActualPT

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed in an increase in nail length but I have been using nail strengthening polish and keratin so I’m not sure which one helped most. As for my hair I did not notice any crazy growth. I noticed a little growth around my edges but that’s it. I’ve been taking it for a month religiously and have one more bottle so I will see the results in two months and edit. This is disappointing because of all the good reviews . the organic biotin amazon advertises actually has great results so after the three months i might switch back.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was skeptical that this vitamin would work for African American natural hair but it really worked! I saw results in just one month of using the vitamin, my hair is longer and the thin areas are filling in, I am truly impressed with the results. I was using a recommended hair vitamin and my results were minimal, I am so glad I took a chance and tried this vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Red diva 41

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with postpartum hair thinning
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for over a month now. I definitely see a difference on my hair. I has reduced the thinning and fall of my hair at postpartum and I see it growing a lot faster than before. I’m using it along with a special shampoo and scalp brushing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It should work in theory
customer_reviews.text: I think it takes more than just a pill to start growing hair back. I have read a very detailed guide to how to regrow hair and this product has many of the ingredients it takes for hair growth to be possible. This in addition with a healthy diet with plenty of greens, nuts and fish should work fine. My brother has been taking this for about 3 months and I thinks his results so far have been disappointing because of his lack of a healthy diet. If you eat unhealthy this product will probably not work for you, it takes sacrifice and change in lifestyle for real change to take effect.
customer_reviews.author: Ryoga Hibiki

customer_reviews.title: Saw results with the first bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd bottle. Love it, I see results. I have a lot of curly awkward baby hairs growing where once those areas were bare. They look awkward as they’re growing but I love seeing that instead of awkward bald spots. I’ve tried various biotin pills and hair growth vitamins. Some make me break out while other vitamins it takes about 2 bottles until I see some kind of results. This brand gave me a slight breakout but it lasted a few days, I just made sure to drink more water. I saw results with just one bottle. Will continue to take.
customer_reviews.author: Jeenn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I'VE BEEN TAKING THIS SUPPLEMENT DAILY FOR TWO WEEKS NOW. MY NAILS GROW A BIT QUICKER THAN USUAL AND WAY STRONGER. MY HAIR TOO LOOKS HEALTHY AT THE ROOTS AND IS GROWING AS FAST AS MY NAILS. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM. THEY DO SMELL A BIT ODD BUT DON'T TASTE BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Valdovinos

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY NOTICED A DIFFERENCE WAY FAST!
customer_reviews.text: I am almost done with my first bottle and I absolutely love these pills. I take two a day and my hair has stopped falling out in outrageous chunks like it used to, still some hair loss but so little I almost don't even notice. Also, I've got a ton of new noticeable growth! I've used so many stupid pills for hair growth and I totally love these! I'm hooked my dudes and ya they're a little pricey, i wish they were a little cheaper, but they work really well so i'm fine paying for it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Basile

customer_reviews.title: Using it just as a boosting ingredient of Biotin - but no side effect
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a biotin supplement as my diet does not provide me with good amount of biotin on a daily basis. So far happy with this product. Hair and nails grow super fast and hair feels healthier after 2 months of using this. Will continue using it as it costs only a 1$ a day.
customer_reviews.author: Sharath Chandra

customer_reviews.title: It is working!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was determined to grow my hair this summer. It is now the longest it has been in years! I can see and feel the new undergrowth coming in. It is nice to put my hair up in a ponytail and feel the thickness of it. I also notice less loss and breakage after I wash and brush. I look forward to getting to new lengths!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brewer

customer_reviews.title: 2 months in, has made little to no difference :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this supplement in hopes to reduce my hairfall (and received a free bottle later from the website, grateful for that, it was very easy and processed efficiently). I was encouraged to try this supplement after reading very positive reviews, and I couldn’t wait to share my success story as well. Unfortunately, after two months of taking it religiously, I haven’t notice much change. My hair continues to fall, maybe slightly less - because I started eating eggs again (had been in purely vegan diet before that). I realize that biotin probably doesn’t solve every hair fall issue, mine could be something else and I hope it helps you with yours!
customer_reviews.author: HanaHaole

customer_reviews.title: Started seeing results after one bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I have had thinning hair since my son was born. After one month I had brand new hair where I previously had none. My scalp is no longer visible and I'm so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Meads

customer_reviews.title: Testing in progress
customer_reviews.text: I have just started these but will do a follow up review in 1-2 months with my results and opinion. I have checked out all of the ingredients in this and they are all meant for obtaining healthy hair and hair growth, but time will tell if this configuration of ingredients and their amounts will be effective towards my loss of hair, thinning hair, brittle hair and slight balding.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: First month down
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using for 1 month so I can’t say with 100% certainty but I think my hair is growing a little faster. I am going to keep taking them for another 2 months before I decide whether this product is legit. One thing is for sure, they are not hurting and the price is right. I tried a different brand for 3 months at $88 a bottle and didn’t see much change so there’s not much to lose here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! Has slowed my hair loss and shedding
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for a little over a week and I've noticed that my hair has stopped falling out as much! That's a huge deal for me! I would lose handfuls of hair everytime I shampooed or brushed my hair, so I the fact that these vitamins have slowed down my hair shedding is amazing! I can't wait to see what my hair looks like after I finish the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Coconutty

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because Im not 100%
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this products for 45 days. Ive also been put on prenatal vitamins bot not until recently. Within 2 weeks I've noticed a huge difference in my hair. More so because people tell me daily how long its getting. The only down side is I have gone over a week without them. They loss stock quickly. My advise is to but more than 1 bottle, and try to reorder before you run out
customer_reviews.author: david picozzi

customer_reviews.title: Notice reduce hair loss
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the pill is as described. The portion size is 2 pills a day. I take it in the morning after breakfast. I did notice that my hair loss was reduced though not significantly. But I think because I didn't take the pill every day as suggested. Because I went outside town and didn't take it for a week and then continue again later on. But even so, I still noticed a small change on my hair. While for my hair length, I think it didn't really change much. It grew as normally and didn't grow any faster than usual. In the end, it's not a bad product and I'll say just give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less shedding
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a reduced amount of shedding. I do drink 64 oz of water a day and paired it with a probiotic which helps with the vitamin absorption. Less shedding means that I am able to retail length and thickness. I will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Og.Ld

customer_reviews.title: don't fret if it takes a lil' bit of diligent focused implementation to return balance !
customer_reviews.text: On my 3rd bottle and then I have 2 more... It's real in the field when you are traditionally handsome and your hair texture is leaning towards the divine, and then bam! You start going thin! OMG this is worthy of much prayer and supplication, and action! I believe it's working and I'm taking in direct conjuction with their Collagen Product and other vitamins and even mushrooms like reishi and shiitake!
customer_reviews.author: Necessary Luxuries Co

customer_reviews.title: SLOW PROGRESS BUT PROGRESS
customer_reviews.text: Experienced hair loss almost balding at the top of my head, you can see my scalp so ordered HAIR ANEW due to its great reviews. I've tried many other supplements for hair growth but stock with HAIR ANEW for 2 months now and its helping, no shedding i see small baby hairs coming out slowly. I also added a lifestyle change of healthy food no sugar and try to stress less and I'm using organic shampoo and conditioner and NIzoral shampoo as well 2-4 a week. Will continue to use this product with additional viviscal professional for a year since i want my hair back and I'm only 33 years old.
customer_reviews.author: linda kuglarz

customer_reviews.title: First product i have tried for hair growth and im stickin with it!
customer_reviews.text: so it has only been one month and wow- I can actually see a difference!! I do wish I took a picture from the beginning because people have actually told me it looks longer in just this short amount of time! awesome product. make sure you do it diligently though :) every day 2 in the AM and I would for sure eat a little something when you take them!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi D

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I rarely assign 5 stars to any product but HairAnew earned it. All of my adult life, I have been losing handfuls of hair each time I brush or shower. I bought the product with some skepticism but I was amazed to see that I am losing only a few hairs per day after 2 weeks of taking 2 pills each day. I stopped taking the pills for a week when I went on vacation and noticed that my excessive hair loss returned. I am so happy to see that simply taking these vitamins helped me to avoid hair loss. For a woman, that is life changing. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christiam Peralta C

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Just started the product but after a day of starting the vitamins, did not lose as much hair in the shower as I normally do. I have waist length hair and at 45 realized I was losing so much hair, like a fistful when I shower. Trying vitamins due to great reviews before approaching my doctor. Fingers crossed. Will update!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover/Rescuer

customer_reviews.title: No new hair yet, but no more hair loss either.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 2nd bottle and so far I haven't noticed any new hair. What I have noticed with the first bottle is that it seems to have stopped the hair loss. Maybe the 2nd bottle will grow hair but if not I am pleased that the loss has stopped. I haven't had any side effects either, which is a good thing. I will continue this as long as I get to benefit from it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Too hard on my stomach
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I can't speak to the effectiveness of this product because it was so hard on my stomach, I could only take one pill (not even a full dose); it left me feeling sick for almost 2 days. This might be a miracle worker for some but unfortunately it is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carley S. Whitson

customer_reviews.title: Hair Growth Supplement That Actually Appears to Work
customer_reviews.text: I'm very hesitant to buy any supplements on Amazon because of all the seemingly fake reviews, but I took a chance with these because I was desperate. Hair loss runs in my family and while I've always taken care of my hair, conditioning it regularly, it was getting noticeably thinner as I aged. While I did make some other changes( taking a variety of other health supplements and going back to my natural hair color) I do believe these supplements have helped. My hair is definitely thicker.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product...in every way! Effectively pure!
customer_reviews.text: The product quickly helped my hair from falling out (after hospitalization) The only reason I gave it 3 stars, is: There is something in the formula that was too strong for MY stomach, and I can only use it intermittedly. But, that's most likely my problem! So, over all, I believe it is an effective good product.
customer_reviews.author: Buyers from California

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try. Works great when taken regularly
customer_reviews.text: I'm noticing a real effect! My hairs growing in wayyy thicker. Tried it for a month and then ended up buying a 6 month supply in order to get it at a bit of a discount
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: #works
customer_reviews.text: My background is in biology, so I'm really picky about the health products I use. This stuff works. I have fine, curly, color treated hair, and have been growing my former pixie cut out for a little over a year. I began experiencing an uptick in my hair loss and quite a bit of breakage around my hairline via hormones/stress from grad school. After using this product for a month, my daily hair loss was back to healthy human quantities (as opposed to existential spiral quantities). Anecdotal evidence, but within the last two months people at yoga and school have commented on how long my hair has been getting. I already purchased again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: A MIRACLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many hair support products, but this is the ONLY product that really works! I am so thrilled! I have been using this product for 1 month, starting on my second bottle and already I see little hairs growing around my hairline in the front. If anyone is on the fence don't be! Hair Anew is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Glamour Girl

customer_reviews.title: I am hopeful!
customer_reviews.text: I had looked at a lot of hair vitamins due to general overall thinning caused by menopause. After looking at the reviews online for various products and researching other remedies as well, I decided to try HairAnew due to the reviews. I am hopeful that this product will at least slow the hair loss I have been seeing. I'm also trying this castor oil treatments. I plan to report back after a few months of using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked and stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this product for almost 4 weeks now. So far in 4 weeks my hair grew a little bit more than 1 in. Don't forget to order your free bottle! You get one free bottle on your first purchase. I ordered it and it arrived in two days, pretty fast! So far, loving this product. Update: I started my second bottle I'm almost done with it and I saw little to no change on my hair growth it is actually falling now, I don't know if the free bottle is exactly the same product you buy but it didn't work for me anymore, so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Steph.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: 3-Month Result
customer_reviews.text: After I start pursuing my master’s degree, which means I always sleep super late at night and being very anxious and stressed out on my courses, I was too scared to see my hair being seriously lost during the first three months. It’s the same story like most others in reviews. I found this product and tried for three months, and it works well. My hair grew more quickly and stronger than I supposed. Unlike those expensive hair serums I’ve tried before since I’ve been suffering from hair loss for really a long time, this capsule is much more affordable and the result is definitely way much better. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: smlv000

customer_reviews.title: New Product, Day 1
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good hair vitamin to help my hair grow faster. It grows so slow that by the time I need a trim due to split ends, I'm cutting off all the length that just grew out. Putting me back at my original short length. I saw so many good reviews for this product. I did get a $3 off coupon when I purchased and today I received my product. I took 2 as instructed. I also recieved a free product coupon inside and was able to chose between a few other products. I chose another bottle of HairAnew. (So basically 2 for the price of 1! Score!) We shall see what happens over the next 60 days!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have only used it for a couple of weeks & I'm already seeing results. My nails are growing & they are getting harder. I love it because I have always had thin brittle nails now they are stronger. I am also noticing less hair loss when I comb through my hair. UPDATE: I have used this product for a little over 3 months and I absolutely love it. My hair seems to be thicker and I am loosing less and less. To the point, that my husband has commented on the fact he is seeing less loose hair around the house from my shedding. Even my eyebrows are growing! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: HairAnew Vitamins Best Product for Hair Growth!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had bariatric bypass surgery in October 2017, and now was at the 4 month phase, when hair loss was to be expected. And, my hair was falling at a rapid rate. I decided to try HairAnew and I can hardly believe the differences it has made it my hair. My hair stopped falling and is growing so long. My nails and even my eye lashes are longer!!!!!!!! This product really does what it says and I am not getting paid to say this!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair product vitamin out there!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using consistently for 3 years.. it’s part of my daily routine!! My hair 3 years ago was dry, frail and short!! My hair now looks and feels amazing!! Length is to middle of back! I’m 54 and going through Menopause.. my hair is thriving!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Tricker

customer_reviews.title: Felt like it made my hair fall out
customer_reviews.text: This was awful for me. About 2 months in, I started shedding hair like I have not done before. Running my hand through my hair 10-20 pieces would come out EVERY TIME. It was everywhere on my pillow in the morning and clothes during the day. This went on for about a month. I stopped taking it, and about a week later, stopped shedding so much hair. It was an unnecessarily stressful experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic hair pills
customer_reviews.text: My hair was falling out in handfuls after bariatric surgery and these pills stopped the hair loss in its tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Wilde

customer_reviews.title: This product WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I used a much, much more expensive product for an entire year hoping for results. After just a few months of using HairAnew my hair is growing faster and there's more of it! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dayle Ann Vidrine

customer_reviews.title: Making a Difference
customer_reviews.text: I began taking HairAnew about 8 months ago after hearing about the positive effect of Biotin on hair growth. I was reluctant to try other popular hair loss products on the market due to known side effects - the trade off was just not worth it to me. I started to look into a natural alternative. This is the only product I have tried of it's kind and selected it after reading reviews on Amazon. I have noticed a definite growth difference and feel that it is safe and effective for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. K.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I went in for a “trim” a couple of months ago but I left the salon with at least 5 inches missing from my head. I decided to give these a try to get my hair to grow back faster. So far I do feel like my hair is healthier but I am not noticing a huge amount of growth yet. I will say that my nails are longer and stronger than ever so I do feel like these must be working. I think I’ll buy another bottle ;)
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: HAIR ANEW WORKS! 👍
customer_reviews.text: I have been going through chemo treatments for a little over a year and my hair was thinning. I started using Hair ANEW about a month ago and really noticed the difference. My hair is thicker, more manageable and not dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon 🍓

customer_reviews.title: Best. Vitamins. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: In February I cut all my hair off, and instantly regretted it.. So in an attempt to grow it all back, I found these on a website with very high ratings, and was able to locate them on Amazon. I am on my 4th bottle, and my hair has grown 7 INCHES. My hair has NEVER grown like this!! Honestly, these are so great. I have tried others, like Sugar Bear Hair and Hairfinity, but they both made me break out pretty bad. This is one of the first hair products that haven't made me break out! I am so happy I found these, and I have recommended them to quite a few people. Definitely, definitely purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just started taking
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for about 2 weeks and I do not notice a difference yet. I bought it because of all the pictures I saw on Amazon of quick, amzing hair growth. Unfortunately, I am not sure if this product will work as well for me, but I will give it a try for another month or two. Some of the reviews have mentioned breakouts and I have noticed that my naturally clear skin has been sprouting some acne since starting this supplement. If it continues, I plan to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Potter

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT grow any new hair!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an Asian male, 44 years old with a receding hairline. I purchased 3 bottles and wanted to try it because of the reviews. After the first 30 days, I figured it's too early to judge so I bought another bottle and went 60 days and still saw no new hair growing. Then I figured I need to go 90 days to see some new hair growing. After 90 days, I still see no new hairs growing. What I did see is a bunch of zits growing all over my face leaving a bunch of scars now and about $90 down the drain. I knew this was too good to be true!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Hair Anew hair growth vitamins for approx. 4 months now. I've tried several products before and some either didn't work, while others changed the texture of my hair. I've experienced inches of hair growth every month. Overall, the results, product quality, price, size and taste (or lack of) is what keeps me ordering these. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these vitamins. I’ve tried several other brands, even pretty expensive ones and I didn’t notice any improvement until taking HAIR ANEW. My hair is thicker, no fall out and healthier. I keep reordering. Keeper for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Makeitrainpink

customer_reviews.title: It actually works! My hairdresser cannot believe it. My hair has never been so long and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: My hair grew 5”! It took a few months, but VERY noticeable! Update. My hair is STILL growing! Awesome product! I keep buying it over and over and over again and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: It's way too soon to give a review on the effectiveness of this product on my hair, but I have given an advanced rating anyway, because I expect this product to deliver. I will be returning here after a month or so, to revisit my initial rating, but I do expect to see the results this product claims. With regard to ingesting the product, I can say it's an easy swallow; I have issues in swallowing so, for me, this is five-star. I'm hopeful that my rating for Hair Quality holds up after a month or two of use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Just started, but A+ for free gift and marketing
customer_reviews.text: Important note: Took my first 2 tablets, but I am giving HairAnew by NatureNetics 5 stars for their free, full-sized gift and marketing, plus the speed with which I received it. (AmazonPrime member) I hope this works. I have thin hair and some balding spots at the crown corners. Tried an expensive product from dermatologist (didn't work), and switched from Nioxin to Bosley shampoo and conditioner and their supplements. I do take Liquid Silica that I purchase on Amazon, which helps. Wanted to tried a new supplement. At any rate, I love the free gift, the marketing, and the fact that they seem to be customer-oriented. We shall see if the product delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace Hairfinity but these did nothing for me. I used a couple bottles so I gave it plenty of time.
customer_reviews.author: Bori87

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: My hair loss slowly started increasing until I eventually saw small patches where there was no hair. The vitamins, along with me trying different shampoos that were less harsh on my scalp, seem to be helping. I have fine, short hairs growing in. I will be trying my 2nd bottle soon, so hopefully I can continue to have good results.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

product_meta.title: HairAnew Hair Vitamins For Women - Vegan Hair Supplement - Vitamins, Micronutrients, Minerals and Botanicals For Healthy Hair, Skin and Nails - Includes Biotin, Silica & Zinc - 60 Capsules (1)
feature_bullets: CONFIDENCE IN A CAPSULE: Do you dream of thick, lustrous hair? Beautiful hair is healthy hair, which is why our team of scientists, nutritional experts and formulators created HairAnew. It includes 11 specially selected ingredients to nourish your hair from the inside and provide the foundation for longer, stronger, healthier hair.

PERFECT FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: HairAnew is suitable for all hair types – straight, wavy, curly and coily – any color, any age. We’ve been selling HairAnew since 2014 and have shipped out more than 11 million capsules so you can trust this product! You should also notice some fabulous additional benefits such as stronger nails, healthier eyelashes and eyebrows, and glowing skin!

NO COMPROMISES: Every batch of HairAnew is manufactured to the highest standards in a state-of-the-art facility in Oregon, USA. Unlike gummies, HairAnew is sugar-free, and unlike other hair supplements, it contains no animal products – it’s completely vegan/vegetarian. It’s also non-GMO, free of gluten, tested for allergens, and absolutely never tested on animals. So you can trust you're taking the healthiest and most ethical product possible.

CLEAN, PURE & PACKED WITH GOODNESS: To ensure the purity of every HairAnew capsule, we get every batch tested by 6 independent laboratories before they arrive at Amazon – and we publish those results for you (summary in images above). These tests prove the HairAnew you’ll receive is safe and has the full amount of all hair-supporting ingredients in every capsule, including 5000 mcg of biotin. You can be confident that what you’re getting is clean, pure, and packed with goodness for your hair.

EASY & GUARANTEED: Order today and thanks to Amazon’s industry-leading fulfilment, you could have your HairAnew supplement in a matter of hours or days. Take 2 small, easy-to-swallow capsules once a day – that’s all it takes to start on your journey to healthy hair, skin and nails. If you’re not excited by the initial results, let us know within 90 days and we’ll happily provide your money back^ – that’s how confident we are. No risk to you, and everything to gain!
